description: &3Melee attacks&r have a &3cooldown&r, which causes rapid attacks to deal as little as &done fifth of their normal damage&r.
The cooldown is indicated by a &3sword indicator&r near the crosshair. When the sword is full, &dattacks deal full damage&r.
&3Swords&r can attack very quickly, and when fully charged perform a &3sweep&r that deals damage to &dall enemies in an area&r. &eSweeping Edge&r increases sweep damage.
Other tools have no abilities, but deal more damage than fists. &3Axes&r deal more damage than swords, but have a &dvery long cooldown&r.
If an attack connects while you're &3falling&r, it becomes a critical hit, dealing &d1.5x damage&r and spilling stars.
&7[EnhancedAttackIndicator]&r the attack indicator also shows bow charging, food eating, and block breaking progress.
